title: Thai rice noodle salad
ingredients: ['225g dried rice noodles', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1/4 head romaine lettuce, chopped', '1/4 red pepper, diced', '40g chopped red onion', '3 spring onions, chopped', '1/4 cucumber, diced', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil, or to taste', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander, or to taste', '1 (2cm) piece fresh ginger, minced', '1/4 jalapeno chilli pepper, seeded and minced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', 'Sauce', '80 ml olive oil', '60ml rice vinegar', '60ml soy sauce', '50g sugar', '1 lemon, juiced', '1 lime, juiced', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1/4 teaspoon paprika']
